title.rendered: STEDI SURFACE MOUNTED SINGLE GAUGE HOLDER

content.rendered:
Surface Mounted Single Gauge Holder

OVERVIEW

Coming Soon.

ILLUMINATION

Coming Soon.

APPLICATION

Coming Soon.

DETAILS

Surface Mounted Single Gauge Holder

  • Perfect for Single Battery Setups
  • Gauge has 360 degree rotation for vertical and horizontal mounting
  • Surface mounted pod

Key Measurements

  • Gauge Diameter 36mm
  • Overall height 50mm
  • Overall width 55mm
  •  OVerall depth 83mm

SPECIFICATIONS

Surface Mounted Single Gauge Holder for dash

*This product only includes the Surface Mounted Single Gauge Holder, accessories sold separately*

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

Surface Mounted Single Gauge Holder

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
